tasks.task_description: Implement Command Pattern for undo/redo operations
Create EditorCommand base class with execute() and undo() methods
Add ReplaceTextCommand for text replacement operations
Implement CommandHistory stack with configurable size limit
Add keyboard shortcuts for undo (Cmd+Z/Ctrl+Z) and redo (Cmd+Shift+Z/Ctrl+Y)
Implement text selection with start/end indices
Implement find functionality with string search
Add cursor navigation with arrow keys
Implement efficient text buffer (Rope or Piece Table)
Create regex pattern support for find/replace

description: Standard text editor implementation with undo/redo, cursor navigation, selection, find/replace, and file operations for Svara Lekhini lyric editor
context: Implemented basic Command Pattern for undo/redo operations with CommandHistory stack and keyboard shortcuts (Cmd+Z/Ctrl+Z for undo, Cmd+Shift+Z/Ctrl+Y for redo). Added command execution system with configurable history size limit of 100 operations.

Fixed Cmd+Z undo functionality by implementing DeleteNoteCommand class and connecting it to the command pattern system. The deleteSelectedNote method now properly creates and executes commands that can be undone/redone.
